name: LARGE UROLOGY GROUP PRACTICE ASSOCIATION (LUGPA)
sampleDescriptions:
H.R. 539, USPSTF Transparency and Accountability Act of 2017;

USPSTF - prostate cancer screening;
H.R. 748 (Public Law 116-136), CARES Act

Possible healthcare policies in upcoming reconciliation package including:  making ACA tax credits/subsidies permanent, adding Medicare enhancements/supplemental benefits (hearing, dental, vision), addressing Medicaid coverage gap, expanding home and community based services;

Senate HELP and Energy & Commerce Public Option RFI
